Balraj Goulikar wrote:

> i am basically trying to find out where, what and how to change if i need
> the output in word doc. nobody wud want to sit and save as every report into
> word doc. probaby one more similar ant task with a bit of changes?

I understand better.

The best thing I know how to do is to use WIN32OLE to automate that 
task. If you needed that to be an Ant task, that would be possible, 
although I've never done it, so I don't know how much work it would be.
